mentor.browseAndConnect: Browse and connect with experienced mentors in your field

mentor.availabilityExample: e.g., Weekdays 9am-5pm EST, Flexible on weekends
mentor.availabilityPlaceholder: e.g., Monday, Wednesday, Friday evenings 8-10pm US Western Time
mentor.bioHelp: We recommend disclosing your background and capabilities while maintaining personal privacy, to help people in need make better choices
mentor.allowReviews: Paid consultants will write reviews and ratings for your service. Please confirm you accept this.
mentor.allowRecording: Both parties have the right to record calls. Please confirm you accept this. If you have privacy concerns, please use voice-changing software.
mentor.validationReviewsRequired: You must accept this term to continue
mentor.validationRecordingRequired: You must accept this term to continue
mentor.createSubtitle: Share your expertise and help others grow
mentor.setupInstructions:
Want to provide career mentoring services on our platform? Please fill in the information below to register as a mentor. Here's how it works:

• Once your profile is saved, job seekers can see your basic information on the "Find a Mentor" page.
• Job seekers can send you mentoring requests with their introduction and preferred mentoring times.
• You can accept or reject requests within 48 hours. Requests that are not processed within 48 hours will be automatically cancelled.
• After accepting a request, you can have one-on-one private chats with the job seeker to confirm mentoring times, payment methods, and meeting links.
• You and the job seeker will have a one-on-one career mentoring session at the agreed time.
• After the mentoring session, the job seeker can leave a review of your service.
mentor.validationNickname: Nickname must be at least 2 characters
mentor.validationBio: Bio must be at least 10 characters
mentor.validationLevel: Select at least one mentoring level
mentor.validationPayment: Select at least one payment method
mentor.validationAvailability: Availability must be at least 10 characters
mentor.validationExpertiseDomain: Select at least one professional domain
mentor.validationExpertiseTopic: Select at least one area of expertise
mentor.linkedinUrlHelp: Add your LinkedIn profile URL for mentees to learn more about your professional background
mentor.validationLinkedInUrl: Invalid LinkedIn URL format. Must be https://www.linkedin.com/in/username or https://linkedin.com/in/username

points.title: Points System
points.label: Points
points.description: Earn points by creating posts, comments, and engaging with the community

commonRules.antiSpamDesc: To maintain quality and prevent spam, we use a diminishing returns system. Point awards decrease if you create too much content within an hour:

rulesDialog.title: How to Earn Points
rulesDialog.intro: Earn points by creating quality content and engaging with the community. Learn about our point system and anti-spam measures below.
rulesDialog.creatingContentDesc: You earn points when you create posts and comments:
rulesDialog.receivingEngagementDesc: You earn points when others engage with your content:
rulesDialog.noPointsForLiking: You don't earn points by liking other people's posts, but the post author does!

notifications.commentCreated: You earned {{points}} points for creating a comment
notifications.likeReceived: You earned {{points}} points - someone liked your post!
notifications.commentReceived: You earned {{points}} points - someone commented on your post!

forumRulesDialog.title: How to Earn Points in Forums
forumRulesDialog.intro: Earn points by creating quality forum threads, replies, and receiving community engagement. Learn about our point system and anti-spam measures below.
forumRulesDialog.creatingContentDesc: You earn points when you create threads and replies:
forumRulesDialog.receivingEngagementDesc: You earn points when others engage with your content:

challengeRulesDialog.title: How to Earn Points in Challenges
challengeRulesDialog.intro: Earn points by participating in challenges, submitting your work, and getting approved. Learn about our point system below.
challengeRulesDialog.participationDesc: You earn points when you engage with challenges:

about.title: Lead Forward
about.subtitle: Lead Forward was founded with a mission to empower individuals to discover and develop their leadership potential through regular practice and community support

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: Become the Leader You Aspire to Be.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To inspire people to be the best leaders they aspire to be by creating opportunities for practical leadership experience in a supportive environment.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.description: Each month, we organize leadership activities designed to help members practice specific leadership skills, receive feedback, and grow as leaders. These activities are carefully structured to address different aspects of leadership in diverse settings.
whatWeDo.item1Desc: Develop communication skills and confidence in presenting ideas to audiences
whatWeDo.item2Desc: Explore how to leverage AI tools and technologies in leadership and innovation
whatWeDo.item3Desc: Practice building cohesive teams and fostering collaboration
whatWeDo.item4Desc: Master techniques for navigating disagreements and finding solutions
whatWeDo.item5Desc: Develop the ability to see the bigger picture and plan for long-term success
whatWeDo.item6Desc: Build self-awareness and empathy to lead with greater effectiveness

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

growthMindset.title: Growth Mindset
growthMindset.description: We believe everyone can develop leadership abilities through practice and persistence

authenticLeadership.title: Authentic Leadership
authenticLeadership.description: Leading with integrity and staying true to your own leadership style and values

communitySupport.title: Community Support
communitySupport.description: Creating a safe, nurturing environment where leaders can take risks and learn

actionablePractice.title: Actionable Practice
actionablePractice.description: Focusing on practical exercises that translate to real-world leadership scenarios

founders.title: Our Founders
founders.subtitle: Experienced leaders dedicated to empowering the next generation

joinUs.title: Join Our Community
joinUs.description: Whether you are looking to mentor others or seeking guidance, there is a place for you in our community. Start your leadership journey with Lead Forward today.
